value.title: DAX Fridays! #78: When should I use FILTER() with CALCULATE?
value.excerpt: When should you use the filter function with CALCULATE? In this video I will try to clarify that question.  Dont miss part

value.title: Explicit Vs Implicit DAX Measures in Power BI
